categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: T-XL was a group of 6 Utility Tugs used by the Rebel Alliance they were located at a Rebel starfighter depot consisting of 2 groups of 3 Class-A cargo containers Vic and Limi. The tugs were scrambling to ferry pilots to the stationary A-wings and X-wings, but were all destroyed by a single TIE Fighter, along with the fighters and finally the containers.
